data.lyric:
[ti:Don't Cry (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Wayne/XXXTentacion]
[al:Tha Carter V (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Don’t Cry (Explicit) - Lil Wayne (李尔·韦恩)/XXXTentacion
[00:02.77]Lyrics by：Dwayne Carter/Jahseh Onfroy/Eugene Karavasilidis/Ben Diehl/Gamal "LunchMoney" Lewis
[00:05.54]Composed by：Dwayne Carter/Jahseh Onfroy/Eugene Karavasilidis/Ben Diehl/Gamal "LunchMoney" Lewis
[00:08.31]Produced by：Ben Billions/Z3N
[00:11.08]Lil Wayne:
[00:11.51]Yeah C5
[00:16.57]XXXTENTACION：
[00:16.63]Don't cry don't go
[00:26.01]Won't lie I f**kin' love you whoa
[00:34.51]Lil Wayne：
[00:34.80]Staring into the clouds
[00:36.44]Am I rising or they comin' down
[00:38.52]I see death around the corner
[00:40.25]And the U turn sign's lookin' like a smile
[00:42.82]What do I do now Who gon' find me how
[00:44.91]Nowhere to turn but around and round
[00:47.19]Just another n***a that done lost his head
[00:49.33]No a f**king king that forgot his crown
[00:51.40]I am not number one it's true
[00:53.45]I'm number 9 27 82
[00:55.41]Color blind even if I may be blue
[00:57.73]A lot on my plate ain't my favorite food
[00:59.91]But I'm hungry so hungry
[01:01.65]Need my family tree next to a money tree
[01:04.28]With a bunch of leaves in the Garden of Eden
[01:06.49]With a bunch of Eves no fruit punch for me
[01:08.55]I sip from the Fountain of Youth
[01:10.42]So if I die young blame the juice
[01:12.87]Bury me in New Orleans
[01:14.35]Tombstone reads Don't cry stay tuned
[01:16.89]Bring me back to life
[01:18.13]Got to lose a life just to have a life
[01:20.05]But if heaven's as good as advertised
[01:22.39]I want a triple extension on my motherf**kin' afterlife
[01:25.47]Rest in paradise
[01:26.32]XXXTENTACION/Lil Wayne：
[01:26.80]Don't cry don't go
[01:34.25]Won't lie I f**kin' love you
[01:42.99]Don't cry
[01:46.92]Don't go
[01:51.39]Won't lie
[01:55.51]I f**kin' love you
[01:59.57]Lil Wayne：
[01:59.87]Talent is God given be grateful
[02:01.87]Fame is not a given be humble
[02:03.80]And conceit is self driven drive carefully
[02:06.06]Stay in your own lane seat buckled
[02:08.30]And sometimes when there is no music
[02:10.36]We toot our own horns rum bum bum bum
[02:12.70]That woman carried the future
[02:14.47]And Tunechi was born like dun dun dun dun dun
[02:17.95]Don't call it a comeback
[02:20.05]It was dark now the sun back
[02:22.10]Hit me hard but I punched back
[02:24.11]The wheels fell off I rode the hubcap
[02:26.19]Is it suicide or it's do or die
[02:28.37]It's newer days and it's bluer skies
[02:30.47]I told myself It's just you and I 
[02:32.74]Then the breeze came and it blew my mind
[02:34.86]Lord knows who I'm there for
[02:36.51]I give my last breath of air for
[02:38.51]Mama tell me to be careful
[02:40.45]Voice in my head give me an earful
[02:42.68]But I got mind control over my control
[02:44.91]I lost control but knew I'd find control
[02:47.12]I let God control what I cannot control
[02:48.86]Can't control the tears let 'em drop and roll
[02:50.85]XXXTENTACION/Lil Wayne：
[02:51.74]Don't cry
[02:55.49]Don't go
[03:00.02]Won't lie I f**kin' love you
[03:08.13]Don't cry
[03:12.65]Don't go
[03:17.12]Won't lie I f**kin' love you
[03:25.46]Lil Wayne：
[03:41.76]Don't cry stay tuned
[03:55.44]And triple extension on my motherf**kin' afterlife
[03:58.43]Rest in paradise
data.trans:
[ti:Don't Cry (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Wayne/XXXTentacion]
[al:Tha Carter V (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.77]//
[00:05.54]//
[00:08.31]//
[00:11.08]//
[00:11.51]专辑《Tha Carter V》
[00:16.57]//
[00:16.63]别哭 别走
[00:26.01]说真的 我真的很爱你
[00:34.51]//
[00:34.80]凝望着天空白云
[00:36.44]是我进步了 还是他们退步了
[00:38.52]我看到死亡就在眼前
[00:40.25]U型转弯标志看起来像一个笑脸
[00:42.82]我现在要做什么 谁会找到我 以怎样的方式
[00:44.91]无处可去 只能不停地兜圈子
[00:47.19]我只是一个失去理智的普通人
[00:49.33]不 我是一个丢了王冠的国王
[00:51.40]我不是世界第一 这是事实
[00:53.45]我只是1982年9月27日出生的普通人
[00:55.41]就算我难过 也不会有人知道
[00:57.73]盘子里很多食物 却没有一样是我爱吃的
[00:59.91]但我真的很饿
[01:01.65]我需要家人 也需要朋友
[01:04.28]伊甸园里有一颗枝繁叶茂的果树
[01:06.49]我身边有一堆女人 我不喝果汁喷趣酒
[01:08.55]我喝着**
[01:10.42]如果我英年早逝 一定是**喝太多
[01:12.87]请把我埋在新奥尔良
[01:14.35]在墓碑上写道 别哭  Lil Tunechi还在
[01:16.89]让我起死回生
[01:18.13]想要重新开始 就要绝处逢生
[01:20.05]如果天堂真像人们说的那么好
[01:22.39]那我希望死后可以在天堂多呆一段时间
[01:25.47]在天堂得到安息
[01:26.32]//
[01:26.80]别哭 别走
[01:34.25]说真的 我真的很爱你
[01:42.99]别哭 
[01:46.92]别走
[01:51.39]说真的
[01:55.51]我真的很爱你
[01:59.57]//
[01:59.87]天赋是上帝赐予的 要心存感激
[02:01.87]名誉不是与生俱来的 要谦逊待人
[02:03.80]自负是自己的心理作祟 要小心行事
[02:06.06]走好自己的路 系好安全带
[02:08.30]就算没有音乐
[02:10.36]也要为自己鼓掌
[02:12.70]妈妈怀上了我就等于掌握了未来
[02:14.47]Tunechi出生时 天现异象
[02:17.95]我现在不叫复出
[02:20.05]以前我生活一片黑暗 现在终于迎来光明
[02:22.10]从来遭受的不公待遇 我一一报复回去
[02:24.11]无论有多少艰难险阻 我都不会停下脚步
[02:26.19]尝试过自杀 但是没有成功
[02:28.37]现在新生活来临 天空更加明媚
[02:30.47]我告诉自己 不要和别人走得太近
[02:32.74]微风吹来 打乱了我的思绪
[02:34.86]上帝知道我一直在等谁
[02:36.51]我愿意为她付出生命
[02:38.51]妈妈告诉我要小心
[02:40.45]她时常在我耳边唠叨 我早就听腻了
[02:42.68]但我向来自控能力很强
[02:44.91]就算偶尔失控 也能恢复理智
[02:47.12]有些事情无法控制 就交给上帝吧
[02:48.86]眼泪憋不住了 就让它流下来
[02:50.85]//
[02:51.74]别哭 
[02:55.49]别走
[03:00.02]说真的 我真的很爱你
[03:08.13]别哭 
[03:12.65]别走
[03:17.12]说真的 我真的很爱你
[03:25.46]//
[03:41.76]别哭  Lil Tunechi还在
[03:55.44]希望死后可以在天堂多呆一段时间
[03:58.43]在天堂得到安息
